welcome.title: Welcome to the booking system
welcome.subtitle: Here you can easily book rooms, equipment and study rooms. Log in with your EK Copenhagen login to get started.

settings.title: Settings
settings.appearance_text: You can change the look of the site here.
settings.language_text: You can change the language between Danish and English of the site here.
settings.rules_admin1: 1. As an admin, you can pause all rooms.
settings.rules_admin2: 2. As an admin, you can cancel all bookings.
settings.rules_admin3: 3. As an admin, there are no time restrictions on bookings.
settings.rules_admin4: 4. As an admin, you can cancel a student's booking if the room is to be used for an exam.
settings.rules_teacher1: 1. As a teacher, you can't book study rooms.
settings.rules_teacher2: 2. As a teacher, you can book class rooms.
settings.rules_teacher3: 3. As a teacher, there are no restrictions on bookings.
settings.rules_teacher4: 4. As a teacher, you can only book a study room if it is to be used for an exam.
settings.rules_student1: 1. As a student, you have first priority in booking study rooms.
settings.rules_student2: 2. As a student, you can book up to four study rooms at a time.
settings.rules_student3: 3. As a student, you can book a study room up to four hours at a time.
settings.rules_student4: 4. As a student, you can risk having your booking canceled if the room is to be used for an exam or under construction.
settings.teacher_description: As a teacher, you can book classrooms to teach in. The rooms are available at EK in Lyngby on Firskovsvej.
settings.student_description: As a student, you can book rooms to study in. The rooms are available at EK in Lyngby on Firskovsvej.

booking.earlybooking: You can't book from earlier dates
booking.roomavailable: Available for the rest of the day
booking.deletebookingtext: Are you sure you want to delete
booking.title: Title
booking.endtimebeforestarttime: End time must be later than start time.
booking.noaccesstoroom: You don't have access to book this type of room.
booking.overlappingbooking: Selected time overlaps with an existing booking:
booking.bookinglimitexceeded: You do not meet the requirements for booking.
booking.choosestartandendtime: Choose both start and end time.
booking.deletethisbooking: Are you sure you want to delete this booking?
booking.selectdatefortimeline: Select a date to see the timeline.
booking.todaytimeexpired: The time window for today has expired.
booking.maxfourhours: As a student, you can book a maximum of 4 hours at a time.
booking.maxfourbookings: As a student, you can have a maximum of 4 future bookings. Delete one before creating a new one.

admin.deleteRoomText: Are you sure you want to delete this room?
admin.fillroomandtype: You must fill in both name and type.

layout.title: Booking system
layout.description: Book room for teaching and exams

ErrorMsg.mustSelectDate: You must select a date first.
ErrorMsg.bothTimes: Select both start and end time.
ErrorMsg.endAfterStart: End time must be later than start time.
ErrorMsg.cantSearchPast: You can't search in a time period that has already passed.
ErrorMsg.noAvailableText: There are no available rooms in this time slot.
ErrorMsg.mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to create a booking.
ErrorMsg.timeDataError: Time data could not be read correctly.
ErrorMsg.cantBookPast: You can't book a time slot that has already passed.
ErrorMsg.noWeekendBooking: Study rooms can't be booked on weekends.
ErrorMsg.withinHours: You can only book between {{start}}:00 and {{end}}:00.
ErrorMsg.limitError: You do not meet the booking requirements.
ErrorMsg.roomOccupied: This room is occupied during the selected time.
ErrorMsg.generalError: An error occurred. Try again later.
